EmailTemplate.name: OSS_Webinar_Building a Shopping Cart in 24 Hours using Spring 10AM.Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar Confirmation: Building a Shopping Cart in 24 Hours using Spring
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=There}}, Your registration is confirmed for the webinar Building a Shopping Cart in 24 Hours using Spring with Casey Doolittle and Phil Dutson. We are looking forward to having you join us.
To help maximize your webinar experience we recommend that you join a test meeting before the session to check your system and browser compatibility at http://www.webex.com/test-meeting.html. Event Details: Date: Tuesday, July 15, 2014 {{my.My Token:default=edit me}}
North America: 10:00am PDT (San Francisco, UTC-07:00) Join the WebEx <https://gopivotal.webex.com/gopivotal/onstage/g.php?t=a&d=663983440>
Dial In: US TOLL FREE+1-855-749-4750 US TOLL+1-415-655-0001 Show all global call-in numbers <https://gopivotal.webex.com/cmp0401l/webcomponents/widget/globalcallin/globalcallin.do?siteurl=gopivotal&serviceType=EC&eventID=111195617&tollFree=1> Show toll-free dialing restrictions <http://www.webex.com/pdf/tollfree_restrictions.pdf>
Access code: 663 983 440
Thank you,
